ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
ygData.msgSnippet: I am in Defenders of Aleria on Bertoxx, and besides myself, there is only one other (Artanis, Lvl 46) Lago Bardoon, Battle Bard of the 41st Composition
ygData.messageBody:
I am in Defenders of Aleria on Bertoxx, and besides myself, there is only
one other (Artanis, Lvl 46)

Lago Bardoon, Battle Bard of the 41st Composition

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Gordon Hughes [SMTP:ghughes@...]
> Sent: Thursday, October 12, 2000 12:41 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
>
> > Just a quick question. How many bards above 30 are there in your guilds?
>
> Gosh. Lets see... well, there's me and...
>
> Me. That's it.
>
> In fact of the 60 people in my guild (Praetoriate on Bertoxxulous), I'm
> the
> only serious Bard. We've got a level 8 twink, and he only ever comes on
> when his regular hunting partner isn't on.
>
> Sometimes I feel like the proverbial redheaded stepchild, but in time I
> suppose that'll have its advantages.
>
> I know Windleaf is on Bertoxx, too, but I've yet to see him on the /who
> all
> bard 30 60 list... (are you anon?) Our server has tons and tons of newbie
> Bards, but they all seem to drop off the face of Norrath when they hit 20
> or
> thereabouts.
>
> At peak times, I'll maybe see 16 post-30 non-anon/rpg Bards.
>
>
> Kyrisha
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
>
